svg.title: DP-05: Multi-Stakeholder Planning Alignment System
svg.desc: Comprehensive stakeholder management system that maintains alignment across diverse stakeholder groups while adapting to changing priorities and requirements. Features real-time stakeholder collaboration, priority voting, impact visualization, and automated consensus building to ensure stakeholder alignment throughout dynamic planning processes while managing competing priorities and facilitating communication across multiple groups.
svg.text: Real-time collaboration • Priority consensus • Adaptive alignment • Conflict resolution

g.text: Current Priority Vote: "Q2 Feature Release vs Technical Debt"
Current Priority Vote: "User Experience vs Performance Optimization"
Current Priority Vote: "Architecture Refactoring vs New Features"
Current Priority Vote: "Automated Testing vs Manual QA Enhancement"
Current Priority Vote: "Customer Requested Features vs Bug Fixes"
Current Priority Vote: "Compliance Features vs Integration APIs"

svg.text: 🗳️ Active Voting Session: Q2 Roadmap Prioritization
12 stakeholders participating • 3 priority items • Deadline: 2h 15m remaining

g.text: Executive summary sent - Q2 roadmap consensus achieved
Team notification - Technical debt prioritization vote started
Conflict alert - Resource allocation requires facilitation
Next: Weekly stakeholder digest in 3 days
Active Vote: Q2 Feature Release vs Technical Debt
Option A: Prioritize Q2 Feature Release
Focus on customer-facing features for competitive advantage
Option B: Address Technical Debt First
Improve system reliability and development velocity
Latest votes: CTO → A, Product Manager → A, Engineering Manager → B
Engineering vs Product priorities require facilitation
• Engineering: 60% budget for refactoring, 40% for new features
• Product: 80% budget for new features, 20% for refactoring
→ Phased approach: Features in Q2, refactoring in Q3
Prioritize Q2 features with quality gates to address tech debt incrementally
• Allocate 20% of feature development time to refactoring
• Implement automated testing to prevent tech debt accumulation
• Schedule dedicated refactoring sprint in Q3

svg.text: Real-time updates: <100ms • Last sync: just now • 12 active collaborators • 89% alignment achieved

g.text: Screen Reader Mode: Navigate stakeholder alignment with keyboard shortcuts
Tab: Next group • Space: Vote • Enter: View details • Escape: Exit mode
